author: jessepollak
content: just posted a post-devcon update on 4844 that covers all the progress and changes we made throughput the conference: https://twitter.com/jessepollak/status/1582784133121859585

author: timbeiko
content:
Over the past few months, we've been having regular calls with the teams working on 4844 prototypes. At first it was mostly Optimism people, and then some Coinbase & Prysm folks joined, and recently Worldcoin, Paradigm and more started showing up. This seems like the right time to make the calls public so that anyone from client/research/testing teams, or otherwise contributing to 4844 can join, and everyone has access to notes/recordings ðŸ˜„ ! 

We've been using 14:30-15:30 UTC on Tuesdays and will keep rolling with that. First agenda, and link to the notes from this week's call (last not public/recorded one) can be found here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/647

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
You need to pull the inphi repository and replace the path in the go.mod.
Then you should be able to use the blob transaction type. Dm me if you need more help
